picostrap_fonts_header_code:
<link rel='dns-prefetch' href='//cdn.jsdelivr.net' /> 
<style>
 @font-face {
    font-family:'Nunito Sans';
    font-style:normal;
    font-display:swap;
    font-weight:200 300 400 500 600 700 800 900;
    src:url(https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/fontsource/fonts/nunito-sans:vf@latest/latin-wght-normal.woff2) format('woff2-variations');
    unicode-range:U+0000-00FF,U+0131,U+0152-0153,U+02BB-02BC,U+02C6,U+02DA,U+02DC,U+0304,U+0308,U+0329,U+2000-206F,U+20AC,U+2122,U+2191,U+2193,U+2212,U+2215,U+FEFF,U+FFFD;
} 
 @font-face {
    font-family:'Lustria';
    font-style:normal;
    font-display:swap;
    font-weight:400;
    src:url(https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/fontsource/fonts/lustria@latest/latin-400-normal.woff2) format('woff2');
    unicode-range:U+0000-00FF,U+0131,U+0152-0153,U+02BB-02BC,U+02C6,U+02DA,U+02DC,U+0304,U+0308,U+0329,U+2000-206F,U+20AC,U+2122,U+2191,U+2193,U+2212,U+2215,U+FEFF,U+FFFD;
}
 </style>
